member.name: M:Robotics.Utilities.Scanner.AdvanceToChar(System.Char,System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Advances the read header to the next occurrence of the specified char
member.param: The char to find
The input string
Read header
member.returns: true if provided character c is found before the end of the string, false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.Utilities.Scanner.AdvanceToChar(System.Char[],System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Advances the read header to the next occurrence of the specified chars
member.param: The array of chars to find
The input string
Read header
member.returns: true if any of the provided characters in c is found before the end of the string, false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.Utilities.Scanner.ReadChar(System.Char,System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Reads the char from input at cc index and compares to the provided char c. If match advances the read header cc
member.param: The expected char to read
The input string
Read header
member.returns: true if provided character c matches the char at cc in input, false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.Utilities.Scanner.ReadString(System.String,System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Reads the char from input at cc index and compares to the provided string. If match advances the read header cc, if does not match the read header cc is not modified.
member.param: The expected string to read. If the expected string is null or empty string an end of string is matched
The input string
Read header
member.returns: true if provided string matches the char at cc in input, false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.Utilities.Scanner.SkipSpaces(System.String,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Advances the read header until no spaces are found
member.param: Input string
Read header

member.name: M:Robotics.PacIto.PacItoCommandManager.PacItoPersonFinderManager.FindHuman(System.String@,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Request PersonFinder to find specified person
member.param: Name of the person to find

When this method returns contains one of the following values: a) The horizontal fov if the response contains 3 parameters (name and FOVs) b) The x coordinate of the centroid of the face based on the center of the camera lens if the response contains 4 parameters (name and coords) c) Double.NaN if no response was received or the response does not contain position data

When this method returns contains one of the following values: a) The vertical fov if the response contains 3 parameters (name and FOVs) b) The y coordinate of the centroid of the face based on the center of the camera lens if the response contains 4 parameters (name and coords) c) Double.NaN if no response was received or the response does not contain position data

When this method returns contains one of the following values: a) The z coordinate of the centroid of the face based on the center of the camera lens if the response contains 4 parameters (name and coords) b) Double.NaN if no response was received or the response does not contain coordinate position data
Amout of time to wait for a response in milliseconds
member.returns: true if specified person was found. false otherwise

member.summary: Request PersonFinder to remember (learn) specified person

member.returns: true if specified person was trained. false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.PacIto.PacItoCommandManager.PacItoObjectFinderManager.FindObjectTop(System.String@)
member.summary: Request ObjectFinder to find specified object with the camera located on Top
member.param: Name of the object to find
member.returns: true if specified object was found. false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.PacIto.PacItoCommandManager.PacItoObjectFinderManager.FindObjectTop(System.String@,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@)
member.summary: Request ObjectFinder to find specified object with the camera located on Top
member.param: Name of the object to find

When this method returns contains one of this values: a) The x-coordinate of the object position if the response contains three position values b) The location of the object respect to the HFOV of the camera (angle measured in radians) if the response contains two position values. c) Double.NaN if the response does not contains position values

When this method returns contains one of this values: a) The y-coordinate of the object position if the response contains three position values b) The location of the object respect to the VFOV of the camera (angle measured in radians) if the response contains two position values. c) Double.NaN if the response does not contains position values
When this method returns contains one of this values: a) The z-coordinate of the object position if the response contains three position values b) Double.NaN
member.returns: true if specified object was found. false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.PacIto.PacItoCommandManager.PacItoObjectFinderManager.FindObjectTop(System.String@,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Double@,System.Int32)
member.summary: Request ObjectFinder to find specified object with the camera located on Top
member.param: Name of the object to find

When this method returns contains one of this values: a) The x-coordinate of the object position if the response contains three position values b) The location of the object respect to the HFOV of the camera (angle measured in radians) if the response contains two position values. c) Double.NaN if the response does not contains position values

When this method returns contains one of this values: a) The y-coordinate of the object position if the response contains three position values b) The location of the object respect to the VFOV of the camera (angle measured in radians) if the response contains two position values. c) Double.NaN if the response does not contains position values
When this method returns contains one of this values: a) The z-coordinate of the object position if the response contains three position values b) Double.NaN
Amout of time to wait for a response in milliseconds
member.returns: true if specified object was found. false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.API.Command.TryParse(System.String,Robotics.API.Command@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a command to a Command object. A return value indicates whether the conversion succeded or not. A string containing the command to convert When this method returns, contains the Command equivalent to the command contained in s, if the conversion succeeded, or null if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the s parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) or is not of the correct format. This parameter is passed uninitialized
member.returns: true if conversion was successfull, false otherwise

member.name: P:Robotics.Mathematics.Matrix.FastDeterminant
member.summary: Calculates the determinant of the matrix. It computes the determinant by reducing the matrix to reduced echelon form using row operations. The function is very fast and efficient but may oerflow in some cases returning NaN. In such cases use the Matrix.Determinant property which computes determinent using minors

member.name: P:Robotics.Mathematics.Matrix.FastInverse
member.summary: Gets the inverse matrix The function returns the inverse of the current matrix using Reduced Echelon Form method The function is very fast and efficient but may cause overflow in some cases returning Null In such cases use the Inverse property which computes inverse using adjugate / determinant

member.name: M:Robotics.API.Response.TryParse(System.String,Robotics.API.Response@)
member.summary: Converts the string representation of a response to a Response object. A return value indicates whether the conversion succeded or not. A string containing the response to convert When this method returns, contains the Response equivalent to the response contained in s, if the conversion succeeded, or null if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the s parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) or is not of the correct format. This parameter is passed uninitialized
member.returns: true if conversion was successfull, false otherwise

member.name: M:Robotics.API.PrimitiveSharedVariables.DoubleSharedVariable.Deserialize(System.String,System.Double@)
member.summary: Deserializes the provided object from a string
member.param: String containing the serialized object

When this method returns contains the value stored in serializedData the deserialization succeeded, or zero if the deserialization failed. The deserialization fails if the serializedData parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) or its content could not be parsed. This parameter is passed uninitialized
member.returns: true if serializedData was deserialized successfully; otherwise, false

member.name: M:Robotics.API.PrimitiveSharedVariables.DoubleSharedVariable.Serialize(System.Double,System.String@)
member.summary: Sserializes the provided object to a string
member.param: Object to be serialized

When this method returns contains value serialized if the serialization succeeded, or zero if the serialization failed. The serialization fails if the serializedData parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) or outside the specification for the type. This parameter is passed uninitialized
member.returns: true if value was serialized successfully; otherwise, false

Source value
Value between 0 and 1 indicating the weight of value2
member.returns: Interpolated value
member.remarks: This method performs the linear interpolation based on the following formula. value1 + (value2 - value1) * amount Passing amount a value of 0 will cause value1 to be returned, a value of 1 will cause value2 to be returned.

member.summary: Removes all objects from the ProducerConsumer queue

member.summary: Adds an object to the end of the queue of the ProducerConsumer

member.name: M:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.Consume
member.summary: Removes and returns the object at the beginning of the queue of the ProducerConsumer
member.returns: The object that is removed from the beginning of the queue of the ProducerConsumer.

member.name: M:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.Consume(System.Int32)
member.summary: Removes and returns the object at the beginning of the queue of the ProducerConsumer If the specified time-out interval elapses, the thread enters the ready queue and returns the default value of the type.
member.param: The number of milliseconds to wait for an element
member.returns: The object that is removed from the beginning of the queue of the ProducerConsumer.

member.name: M:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.ToArray
member.summary: Copies the ProducerConsumer<T> elements to a new array.
member.returns: A new array containing elements copied from the ProducerConsumer

member.name: P:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.Count
member.summary: Gets the number of elements contained in the ProducerConsumer

member.name: P:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.Capacity
member.summary: Gets the number of elements that the Queue can store

member.name: P:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.DiscardExcedent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the the last element of the queue will be discarded when a new element is stored in a fixed size ProducerConsumer object. If the ProducerConsumer has fixed size and this value is set to false, the Produce method will block untill there is space in the queue
member.remarks: This value has not effect on non fixed size ProducerConsumer objects

member.name: P:Robotics.ProducerConsumer`1.FixedSize
member.summary: Gets a value indicating if the ProducerConsumer has fixed size
member.remarks: A fixed size ProducerConsumer object will not increase the size of its queue. The exceding contained objects may be discarded depending on the value of the DiscardExcedent property

member.name: T:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter
member.summary: Serves as base class for classes which allow execute a Command synchronously
member.remarks: A SyncCommandExecuter blocks the CommandManager trhead until the execution of the command has been finished; therefore no other commands will be parsed or executed. If the execution of the command requires to wait for an event to occur (like incoming data) or takes more than a few lines of code or will take more than a few microseconds to execute, use instead an AsyncCommandExecuter.

member.name: F:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.busy
member.summary: Indicates if the executer is busy

member.name: F:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.running
member.summary: Flag that indicates if the asyncExecutionThread is running

member.name: M:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.#ctor(Robotics.API.Signature)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SyncCommandExecuter
member.param: The Signature object for the command that the CommandExecuter will execute

member.name: M:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.#ctor(Robotics.API.Signature,Robotics.API.CommandManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SyncCommandExecuter
member.param: The Signature object for the command that the CommandExecuter will execute
The CommandManager object that will handle the command executed by this CommandExecuter instance

member.name: M:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SyncCommandExecuter for the synchronous execution of a command
member.param: The name of the command that the SyncCommandExecuter will execute

member.name: M:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.#ctor(System.String,Robotics.API.CommandManager)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of SyncCommandExecuter for the aynchronous execution of a command
member.param: The name of the command that the SyncCommandExecuter will execute
The CommandManager object that will handle the command executed by this CommandExecuter instance

member.name: M:Robotics.API.SyncCommandExecuter.Abort
member.summary: Aborts the command execution
member.returns: false, since SyncCommandExecuter objects usually cannot be aborted

member.summary: When overriden executes the provided command
